value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI

value.title: ConcatenateX in Power BI and DAX   Concatenate Values of a Column
value.excerpt: It happens often in Power BI calculations and reports that you need to concatenate a list of values from a column. You can do this concatenation in Power Query or DAX. value.title: DAX Fridays! #77: GROUPBY, CURRENTGROUP
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays, we will go through the DAX function GROUPBY with an example.  GROUPBY is similar as SUMMARIZE, but the difference is that in the expression part, you use DAX iterators to get your results. You can also nest GROUPBY functions to get for example the highest sales amount by country.

value.title: FILTER Function in DAX and Power BI   Apply Custom Filter to Calculations
value.excerpt: You can apply filtering to visualization elements. However, sometimes filtering has to be done on specific calculations. This can come in handy especially when you want to compare values of other items with specific items. In this article and video, Ill explain how to use the FILTER function in DAX
